wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Stearn (20 November 1796, at Cambridge – 21 March 1862, at Cambridge) was an English professional cricketer who played first-class cricket from 1825 to 1840.  He was mainly associated with Cambridge Town Club and made 22 known appearances in first-class matches.
